snippet.title: A Cyberpunk's Dream of 2077 OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
(GAME IS ARCHIVED AND UNAVAILABLE)

I had two goals with this short visual novel.  First goal: figure out a New Vegas-style dialogue system with speech checks.  The system still needs work for future projects, but for this one its nice.  Second goal: release a cyberpunk game for the Cyberpunk 2077 Jam on November 19th as a show of rebellion towards the actual Cyberpunk 2077 getting delayed yet again.  Yes, I am that petty.

DOWNLOAD ON ITCH.IO: Coming soon!

ORIGINAL DESCRIPTION:
"Passed out after a night of New Year’s Eve partying, you are awoken from your stupor by a RetailBot.  This robot informs you that it had a dream, and would like your help in determining its meaning.  You are free to help or hinder this robot.  Just remember: words and actions can have consequences…

A (very short) cyberpunk visual novel
Dialogue system inspired by RPG classics
Four distinct endings based off your choices throughout the game
Pixel graphics!
Featuring photography from Unsplash.com and music by Alexander Nakarada"
